Triggers

Name Description Expression Priority
{#SNMPVALUE} status is faulted <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {Lenovo EMC PX4-300d:diskStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}].str(FAULTED)}=1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> disaster
{#SNMPVALUE} status is foreign <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {Lenovo EMC PX4-300d:diskStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}].str(FOREIGN)}=1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> average
{#SNMPVALUE} status is missing <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {Lenovo EMC PX4-300d:diskStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}].str(MISSING)}=1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
{#SNMPVALUE} status is faulted (LLD) <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {Lenovo EMC PX4-300d:diskStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}].str(FAULTED)}=1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> disaster
{#SNMPVALUE} status is foreign (LLD) <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {Lenovo EMC PX4-300d:diskStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}].str(FOREIGN)}=1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> average
{#SNMPVALUE} status is missing (LLD) <p>-</p> <p>Expression: {Lenovo EMC PX4-300d:diskStatus.[{#SNMPINDEX}].str(MISSING)}=1</p><p>Recovery expression: </p> high
